title: Incorrect buffer pointer arithmetic and initialization
problem: The initialization of `tradPrv` uses the comma operator incorrectly within the brace initializer, or attempts to initialize 3 fields when `BSL_Buffer` likely has 2. Critically, `tradPrv.data` is initialized to `prv->data` (the start of the buffer) instead of the offset pointer. This causes the traditional private key to be set using the PQC private key data.

title: Missing break statement in switch case
problem: The `CRYPT_PKEY_COMPOSITE_SIGN` case falls through to the `default` case. While the `default` case contains a `break`, relying on this fallthrough is fragile and considered bad practice.

title: Duplicate const qualifier
problem: The variable `g_pqcpKeyMgmtCompositeSign` is declared with `const const`. This is redundant.
